title: EM1 - Galvanometer
description: detects or measures small currents and voltages by using a moving coil.

title: EM2 - Audio Oscillator
description: Different circuits and components are used to create different waveform shapes (sine, square, triangle, etc.).

title: EM3 - Variac
description: Power supply used to provide a variable AC voltage output, allowing for precise adjustments of voltage levels in various applications.

title: EM21 - Charging by Induction
description: Shows charging by induction.

title: EM22 - Faraday's Ice Pail
description: Shows distribution of charge.

title: EM23 - Charge On Concentric Shells
description: Shows the distribution of charge on concentric shells.

title: EM24 - Center of Gravity
description: Shows the distribution of charge on irregularly shaped objects..

title: EM25 - Charging By Induction
description: Shows charging by induction.

title: EM26 - Van de Graaf Generators
description: Generates static electricity.

title: EM27 - Box Of Electrostatic Demos
description: Demonstrates concepts in electrostatics.

title: EM28 - Capacitance
description: Demonstrates the concept of capacitance.

title: EM29 -Capacitor With Dielectric
description: Shows the effect of a dielectric on capacitance.

title: EM30 - Capacitor With Ball
description: Simple electrostatics demonstration.

title: EM31 - Spark Gaps
description: Amusing electrostatics demonstration.

title: EM32 - Variable Capacitors
description: Shows the effect of plate distance on capacitance.

title: EM33 - Kelvin Current Balance
description: a device, also known as an ampere balance or current balance, used to precisely measure electric current

title: EM34- The Electrostatic Field
description: Shows the direction of the electrostatic field.

title: EM35 - The Electrophorous
description: Illustrates the basic principle of many electrostatic machines.

title: EM36 - Triboelectricity
description: Basic experiments on electrification by contact and friction.

title: EM37 - Swinging Pith Ball
description: Simple electrostatics demonstration.

title: EM38 - Proof Planes
description: Used for transferring charge.

title: EM39 - Gold Leaf Electroscopes
description: Used to measure potential difference.

title: EM40 - Whimshurst Machines
description: Used to generate static electricity.

title: EM51 - Resistance
description: Shows the difference between resistance in series and resistance in parallel.

title: EM55 - Back EMF Of Motor
description: Demonstrates back EMF.

title: EM57 - Time-Dependent Currents
description: Shows that a capacitor “passes” alternating current but not direct current.

title: EM60 - Time Constant
description: Demonstrates the time constant of a capacitor.

title: EM61 - Variable Capacitor
description: Enables varying capacitance for demonstrations.

title: EM62 - Giant Capacitor
description: A large capacitor.

title: EM63 - 1 Farad Capacitor
description: A capacitor with high capacitance.

title: EM64 - Capacitor In A Glass
description: Unusual capacitor.

title: EM65 - Canned Capacitors
description: A series of capacitors.

title: EM66 - Box Of Capacitors
description: Shows a variety of capacitors.

title: EM93 - Alternating Currents
description: Demonstrates parallel resonance.

title: EM94 - Tesla Coil
description: Produces extremely high voltage build-up.

title: EM96 - LR Circuit
description: Demonstrates the current variation in an LR circuit.

title: EM97 - Self-Inductance
description: Shows self-inductance using an LRC circuit.

title: EM98 - Electrical Beats
description: Demonstrates electrical beats.

title: EM100- Resonance
description: Demonstrates electrical resonance.

title: EM121- Step-Up Transformer
description: Impressive high-voltage demonstration.

title: EM125 - Parallel Currents
description: Shows the attraction and repulstion of parallel currents.

title: EM126 - Step-Down Transformer
description: Demonstration of low voltage, high current conditions.

title: EM127 - Bulbs Light Via Inductance
description: An entertaining demonstration of inductance.

title: EM128 - Induction in a Coil
description: Shows electromagnetic induction in a coil of wire.

title: EM129 - Self-Inductor
description: Shows self-inductance.

title: EM130 - Magnetic Braking
description: Shows the effect of eddy currents.

title: EM131 - Induction: Coil-to-Coil
description: Shows induction from one coil to another.

title: EM132 - Induction: Spinning Magnet
description: Shows induction from a changing magnetic field.

title: EM133 - Earth Inductors
description: Shows induction using the Earth's magnetic field.

title: EM141 - Galvanometer
description: Shows the mechanism of a galvanometer.

title: EM142 - Magnetic Field in Loop
description: Shows the direction of the magnetic field in a current-carrying loop.

title: EM143 - Lodestone
description: Shows a naturally occurring magnetic material.

title: EM144 - North and South Poles
description: Shows the dipole nature of magnets..

title: EM145 - Mahomet's Coffin
description: Shows repulsion of like poles of a magnet.

title: EM146 - Mahomet's Coffin - Rings
description: Shows repulsion of like poles of a magnet.

title: EM147 - Magnetic Field - Bar
description: Shows the magnetic field of a bar magnet.

title: EM148 - Induced Magnetisation
description: Demonstrates induced magnetisation.

title: EM149 - Magnetic Field - Current
description: Shows the magnetic field due to a current-carrying wire.

title: EM150 - Sticks
description: Demonstrates the magnetic force.

title: EM151 - Oersted's Experiment
description: Shows the direction of the magnetic field around a current-carrying wire.

title: EM152 - Force on Moving Charge
description: Shows the force on a moving charge in a magnetic field.

title: EM153 - Faraday Cage
description: Shows wavelength-dependent transmission of electromagnetic waves.

title: EM155 - Hysteresis
description: Demonstrates hysteresis.

title: EM156 - Curie Temperature
description: Demonstrates the Curie point.

title: EM157 - Magnetic Field - Disc
description: Shows the magnetic field surrounding a disc.

title: EM170 - Cathode Ray Tubes
description: Produce electron beams.

title: EM171 - Thermionics: Diodes - Rectification
description: Demonstrates converstion from AC to DC current.

title: EM172 - Discharge Tubes
description: Demonstrate phenomena related to electric discharge in gases

title: EM173 - Positive Rays
description: Tube with slotted cathode
